availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: U.S. Army, soldier. Philadelphia, Pennsylvania native. Graduated from the U.S. Military Academy in 1853. Served in the U.S. Army as second lieutenant, captain, major, and lieutenant colonel from 1853 to 1868.

ab.bibl:
James Grant Wilson and John Fiske, eds., Appletons' Cyclopedia of American Biography, Vol IV (New York: D. Appleton and Company, 1888), 705.
Find A Grave, "Louis Henry Pelouze (1831-1878)," Memorial #5988426, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/5988426/louis-henry-pelouze (accessed November 29, 2018).
